macro.name: PVONE
macro.description: A setpoint PV to monitor, e.g. IN:INSTNAME:EUROTHRM_01:A01:TEMP:SP

macro.name: PVTWO
macro.description: A readback PV to monitor, e.g. IN:INSTNAME:EUROTHRM_01:A02:TEMP

macro.name: SAFE_VALUE
macro.description: Value written to PVONE when both PVs are above their maximum limits
